caption: An elderly man and a boy walk through the forest, tied to a rope that leads to a house. They are accompanied by a dog and a strange large bird. At night, the elderly man and the boy sit by a campfire and chat. The next day, they wake up to find themselves near a cliff. The large bird climbs on top of the house and cries out into the distance. At this moment, a yellow dog accompanying the elderly man encounters a fierce black dog. The elderly man and the boy try to move away from the dogs but are blocked by two of them. They continue to pull the flying house on the rope through the canyon but are confronted by a group of dogs blocking their path.
